81412.<center>これなるは 試練の門……。: This is the gate of trials...

81413.<center>この門を通らんとする者よ\n試練の魔物に挑み 汝のチカラを示せ。:
Those who would pass through this gate,
challenge the monsters of this trial and show
thy power.

81717.運命の振り子に 少し チカラが宿った。\n振り子を さらなる輝きで満たすために\:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained a little more
power. Try looking elsewhere to increase its
power even further.

81718.運命の振り子が 輝きを放ちはじめた！\nグランゼドーラ城２階の\nルシェンダの所:
The Pendulum of Fate began shining
brilliantly! Report back to Lushenda in Gran
Zedora Castle's second floor.

87872.運命の振り子に かなり チカラが宿った。\n３か国をまわったので グランゼドーラ:
The Pendulum of Fate has grown in power considerably. Now that you've traveled to the three countries, return to Lushenda in
Gran Zedora Castle's second floor.

87873.運命の振り子に チカラが宿った。\n振り子が 輝きを放つには\nあと少し チカラ:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained power. It
still needs a bit more.

90367.運命の振り子に 少し チカラが宿った。\n振り子を さらなる輝きで満たすために\:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained a little more
power. Try looking elsewhere in Lendersia to
increase its power even further.

90368.運命の振り子に だいぶ チカラが宿った。\n振り子を さらなる輝きで満たすために:
The Pendulum of Fate is now much more
powerful. Keep looking around Lendersia to
increase its power further.

90369.運命の振り子に かなりのチカラが宿った。\n振り子が 輝きを放つには\nあと少し:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained a lot of
power. It still needs a little more.

90370.運命の振り子が 輝きを放ちはじめた！\nグランゼドーラ城２階の\nルシェンダの所:
The Pendulum of Fate began shining
brilliantly! Report back to Lushenda in Gran
Zedora Castle's second floor.

90371.運命の振り子に 少し チカラが宿った。\nさらなる輝きで満たすため 勇者姫アンル:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained a little more power. To gain more, Anlucia must master the Sacred Skills to protect the Divine
Crimsonites.

90372.運命の振り子に チカラが宿った。\nさらなる輝きで満たすため 勇者姫アンルシアに:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained more power. To fill it even more, Anlucia must master the Sacred Skills to protect the Divine
Crimsonites.

90373.運命の振り子が 輝きを放ちはじめた！\nグランゼドーラ城２階の\nルシェンダの所:
The Pendulum of Fate began shining
brilliantly! Report back to Lushenda in Gran
Zedora Castle's second floor.

94177.運命の振り子に 少し チカラが宿った。\nさらなる輝きで満たすため 神の緋石を探:
The Pendulum of Fate gained a little power.
To fill it even more, the Divine Crimsonites
must be protected from those who are evil.

94178.運命の振り子に チカラが宿った。\nさらなる輝きで満たすため 神の緋石を探しだし:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained more power.
To fill it even more, the Divine Crimsonites
must be protected from those who are evil.
